name: Mysterious M.A.C: Agency of Couriers
description:
Just when we were going to upload the final version, time is up. So for now you can not go from the home screen. :c

Real game:
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1p7Skb7Axq9MDgbk3_YO2VjJkzjrbGGFj

Deliver the desired items to their recipients ... although you don't know who each gift is for ...

Made for the Yogscast Game Jam.
We did not finish it, but we had lessons during the process.

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

1 & 2 to change gift.

Space to give the gift.

Credits:
Jaime Arancibia
Pablo Calderón
Ignacio Gajardo
Benjamin Rubio

Ciro Studios 2019
